website_summaries.verdict: Kit arrives with 4 levels of grit for exceptional results. Great gift idea for younger hobbyists, but requires some patience.
pros: Easy to clean between tumbling cycles
Also works with jewelry and ammo casings
cons: Belts and tumbler sometimes fail within weeks

customer_reviews.title: Quiet operation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my grandsons for Christmas. He had asked for a different model/brand with a metal barrel. I read the reviews where I saw multiple complaints regarding the noise level. I found this one and he and his parents are all thrilled with it.The rubber barrel makes all the distance, making it much quieter. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigalways

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted. We have had GREAT success with this rock ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a different brand for my son originally, not doing my research for some reason, as I always do. It was a piece of junk. Money wasted. We have had GREAT success with this rock tumbler. We are not yet finished with the first set of rocks, but after each session, they have looked amazing. We are now on the polishing phase and cannot wait to see the end result. We highly recommend this to anyone interested in purchasing a rock tumbler. It has actually been fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: K Evans

customer_reviews.title: Time waster...
customer_reviews.text: I would probably spend a little more on a better model. I’ve spent countless hours on the 4 step polishing process. Even went more days than what was suggested in trying to achieve a shiny, polished stone. The biggest complaint would be the fact that the tumbler makes quite the mess with the rubber dust that is produced from either the tumbler or machine. Don’t recommend this one. Keep searching.... (see pic)
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: If the product is as good as the customer service, I have a Winner
customer_reviews.text: This is something I have wanted to do for a long time. I am always mesmerized by the beautiful polished stones. Now I have one of my Granddaughters (8yrs old) who is also interested. She even said she hoped for some nice polished crystals for her birthday coming up in March. She was so excited when this arrived and I showed her what it was for, she helped me load up the first batch. Unfortunately the tumbler motor failed after the third or fourth day. I contact Megan at Dr. Cool to help she took great care to make sure I was happy with my Purchase and replaced the defective tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: DWalls

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tumbler! I love the digital timer, so I just set and leave it. I am only on the second grit, but already the rocks supplied with this tumbler are smooth! I bought some extra jasper rocks to do after these are done - very exciting! Not just for kids! The only reason for the 4 stars is that I've struggled getting the lid to stay on straight, but it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Suebee

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a rockhound, I use it to stir jars of Organic peanut butter that has no additives except for some sea salt. Thus the oil separates. Rolling the jar for a couple of days mixes it easy peasy. I tried a paint stirrer in my electric drill and that was a pain in my shoulder. I do have to use a spare drive belt around one end of the jar so it doesn't drag but that's minor and they're cheap to replace. A PBJ made with organic non gmo peanut butter and strawberry jelly is just this side of ambrosia. This item makes it easy to have whenever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good rock tumbler for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price. I had another brand, but getting the lid off to rinse and change grit was always a challenge and it was really noisy. This model has a better lid and is much quieter. I also prefer the way the tumbler just sits on top of the rollers as opposed to the old one where you had to position two pegs on the end of the tumbler into slots. One peg finally wore down and the barrel was then too short and I had to throw it away. This model also has a timer so you can set it for your desired tumble time.
customer_reviews.author: pbm

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is February, but today we finally got to open it and use it. To our dismay it won’t even turn on for more than 2 minutes. We have followed all of the instructions to make sure it isn’t overfilled. But something tells me it’s an internal problem with the motor or “sensor.” It keeps shutting off! What a waste of money. My 10 year old is super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Patrice Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as expected! (Which is good!)
customer_reviews.text: One of my best birthday buys! Got this for my partner as a birthday gift and it’s great! We’re still working at our first batch of rocks but we really love it. We keep it in our kitchen and it almost just sounds like a dishwasher or something. We don’t leave it running at night but we could if we wanted to!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Littleboy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY WASTE OF YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This this is a peice of crap...completely garbage. As you can see the tumbler started to wear already as well as the belt. Also these rocks have tumbled for a month...not polished. The edges are knocked down but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: John egri

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I purchased for my 5 and 8yo kids for Xmas. It takes a long time (I think 3 weeks in total) but every stage where you change out the grit was a lot of fun for them and the end result was great. We've only used it for 1 batch of rocks, the ones that came with the tumbler. My kids have been collecting interesting looking rocks since then and I purchased another 4 stage tumbling kit so we will see if the next batch comes out as good as the first.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Quiet MachinE,
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter machine than the one my acquaintance has. Easy to load and operate. Caution: Very easy to overload which caused the belt to pop off. Would like a way to salvage grit for reuse so it was not always necessary to use new grit. Discovered that it works better if you load rock/gems of similar hardnesses. I wanted to polish calcite with emerald. The calcite was almost gone before i realized hardness was an issue.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: You and your child will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality. My 8 year old daughter is a rock hound and loves polishing her rocks. Comes with everything to get you going. Might want to order extra grit since it only comes with enough for your 1st barrel full, stage 1-4. Machine runs a lot quieter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is probably only good for polishing one stone at a time. It shuts off within minutes of starting. Been removing stones for days now trying to lighten the load in hopes that it stays going. Avoid this one
customer_reviews.author: Randy Landers

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like about this tumbler is I found the top rubber lid tends to come off as black smoodge (this maybe common for tumblers I don't know). However, it gets the job done. After running about 10 cycles, it started not working - would cycle a couple of turns, then stop with all lights on. Only way to reset would be to unplug it. I contacted customer service to find out what I was doing wrong and they immediately offered to send me a replacement (they said it was probably the circuit board or bad soldering). Totally impressed that they stand behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Harmon

customer_reviews.title: We love this Rock Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. My husband and I collected many rocks while we were panning for gold. This little rock tumbler works very nicely. Polished up these rocks beautifully. It has a timer that you can set to let you know when to go to the next step. It never shuts off before it should and we love it. Can't wait to go find new rocks to put in it. Great for jewelry making, etc...
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: So far - so good!
customer_reviews.text: I had a rock tumbler when I was in fifth grade, and my now second grader asked for one for her birthday. We received it and it is up and running in the laundry room. We just emptied phase one with the coarsest grit and the rocks look great! We can't wait to see the finished product. The tumbler is quieter than I remember from my childhood. It's an ambient noise muffled by the closed door. We'll post pictures when we finish!
customer_reviews.author: kprints

customer_reviews.title: Quietest tumbler I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite tumbler for the small hobbyist. The barrel is rubber, the lid fits inside the lip of the barrel, and the metal outer lid secures all parts together. You then dial in how many days you want the rocks/gems to tumble. Then push power to go! Only downside I have so far, is the machine doesn’t allow you to dial in more than 7 days, so at the end of those 7 days, you have to add 7 more days. This is for the primary cycle. For me, a calendar close by is an absolute must. The best feature: IT IS QUIET!
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you. This thing is extremly quiet and easy to use. It can also hold a lot more stones than expected. Tumbling is a very long process. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MadAlice

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea for an adolescent or novice rock hound
customer_reviews.text: Got for a gift for my 6th grader. Great value, very robust construction, especially considering the reasonable cost for Unit. The barrel was a little smaller than we expected, but that was our error, not manufacturer. Highly recommend for person showing interest in ‘rock hounding’ , or novice. It comes w/ a small Amount of grits and enough stones for first secession, order extra grit w/ it. We were very pleased w/ purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rhett

customer_reviews.title: Quiet for a rock tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's tenth birthday. She loves it. Easy to use and set up. Big fan of the rubber tumbling drum, but we still moved it to our basement as, by nature of being a rock tumbler, it does make some noise. Very happy with everything about the kit that was provided. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: I was weary purchasing due to the mixture of comments about the motor giving out or it leaking but I have ended up purchasing 4 that all have run nonstop for about a month now and have had no issues with leaking ir motors going out. So worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jeff&Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit!!!!!! Can't wait to get another batch!!! A little upset that all the rocks that were in booklet were not there😭😭 3 kinds were missing. Would only recommomend for people who have patients. It is so worth the wait 100 percent!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen michalowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, slow but well worthy the work in accomplishment for your little explorers.
customer_reviews.text: Solid gift item and very, well made though a bit messy with the grit material. Its a slow in process to polish but that is the nature of how the tumbler works. Not a quick procedure at all. Unit is very well made for its price point and kid will be generally very happy and proud of their findings and accomplishments. The tumbler is easily cleanable and relatively low noise and vibration depending on the rock and grit load.
customer_reviews.author: Newtyp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson loves the result, but like most kids his age hates having to wait for the finished product. Good things come to those who wait.
customer_reviews.author: JKK

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved the idea of it
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my 9 year old grandson. He loved the gift it is going to take weeks to polish any stones because it to noisy and they live in an apartment with no garage. We still need to see the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this rock tumbler. Unfortunately we lost the top so are unable to use it anymore. It is kind of loud so if you have a small house try putting it in the basement. Tumbles stones into beautiful smooth rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing some beachcombing lately and wanted to polish some agates that I picked up. I didn't want to spend a lot of money, so I purchased this rock tumbler. It was easy to set-up and use. The rocks are still tumbling, so I don't know the final results yet but I'm pleased with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It won’t last
customer_reviews.text: It worked for one cycle and quit running. Junk wish I could return it. For 70 bucks you should get a product that last more than. A month. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: charlie nickel

customer_reviews.title: We're astounded how beautiful even our funny rocks are just after one tumbling
customer_reviews.text: We just finished three days with the #1 grit, using our own stones. We're saving the stones in this package for a future tumbling. We just used several stones saved locally and over time in traveling. We're astounded how beautiful even our funny rocks are just after one tumbling. I/we love it and we're eager to go on. We'd love to know how to replace the grit for future tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi634

customer_reviews.title: Solid tumbler produces nice rocks with a lot of patience.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this after getting some rocks from gem mine tourist place on vacation. Currently on my second batch. The rocks come out nice but I learned to use a filler as my first batch ground some of the stones down to a fraction of the size they started at. Also expect about a month of tumbling to complete one set of rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A fine introduction, lasts half a year
customer_reviews.text: As an introductory tumbler the little machine seems like a fine device, but after seven months of dedicated use (really only stopping when changing out loads) the engine finally got too weak to reliably turn the tumbler, shutting down after a couple hours of use. After spending a day cleaning, restarting, adjusting, restarting... I just gave up and bought the next more durable model up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Slow loud and cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a five star rock tumbler BUT aware that it will take 3 Months of NON-Stop rock Tumbling to see results. Which only makes it a good gift for kids if you trying to teach them about delayed gratification. And you need an outside place to plug in. It to load to keep indoors
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: Nice tumbler for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 10 y/o for Christmas, and he has absolutely loved it. We've all enjoyed seeing how the rocks have changed when coming out of the tumbler after each stage. It's been running non-stop for over a month with no problems thus far. I'll be sure to update if we encounter issues, but so far we feel this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: MHagley

customer_reviews.title: Best Rock Tumbler for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Rock Tumbler was purchased for our grandson’s birthday in July. Studied many on line for best tumbler for a nine year old. Considered price, functionality, NOISE, and reviews. Expect and hope thus item lives up to its name.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: So far so good A+
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old is obsessed with collecting rocks. We are on day 3 of Grit #1 so far. It’s fairly quiet. It runs in the basement and we can’t hear it at all on the main floor. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: WesCropMan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s working great! Took it out of the package, no assembly required. Came with an extra belt just in case. It’s states that this is a quiet machine. It’s not so quiet. We put it in a foam cooler, left a gap in the lid, then put a blanket over, except for the gap. We can still hear it, but now it’s not as offensively loud. Not sure how the grit is reusable, so I ordered more grit to use for future batches.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bradley

customer_reviews.title: rock tumbler
customer_reviews.text: i love the rock tumbler. i have some gorgeous rocks in there now that i have found in lake superior. my only problem is the grit. i know im going to need alot more i just dont know where or how to find it. and do i go with just one size or grit or go for several. thanks again and your letter was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: gramma witch

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing that it gave my granddaughter and I a hobby that takes time and patience, but the results are well worth it. We now go around looking for stones that we can polish into gems.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Rocks came out perfect! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly, ran 7 days in a row on the first tumble. Rocks came out perfect! Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: JAMaidens

customer_reviews.title: Small tumbler capacity- but good for first time users
customer_reviews.text: Works well, In second stage. Small tumbler capacity- but good for first time users. Not to loud. Happy with purchase. Will have to find other sources of buying the grit though for second round through (after I finish the first batch.)
customer_reviews.author: o43

customer_reviews.title: I would like a replacement. 1st time using it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: 1st time using the motor shuts off. It runs for 2 seconds stops all the lights flash then nothing. Very disappointing for me and my son.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Mulqueen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use, this tumbler stopped working. The belt seemed too loose so I changed to the spare that came with the unit, and then to spare belts that I ordered online. Still no good. So I wrote to Dr. Cool customer service and they sent me a new base. Strangely, though, it came without belt. In any case, the original belts work fine so I am back to tumbling. Very pleased with Dr. Cool so far.
customer_reviews.author: PValliere

customer_reviews.title: No way you won’t be happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, surprisingly quiet (considering the job it’s doing), comes with a really cute guide for kids and helpful tips for adult users. The part I’m most happy with is the absolute AMAZING customer service I received from the company when I emailed with some questions and troubleshooting. There is absolutely no way you won’t be happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I hoped it would be a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: Not done starts because it's pretty small. I haven't had the issues other reviewers had. I do like how well the drum seals
customer_reviews.author: BrianT

customer_reviews.title: It came super fast just in time for a little ones birthday
customer_reviews.text: It came super fast just in time for a little ones birthday. The box was dented on a corner but the tumbler is up and running, just started #2 grit and we have one excited little girl. Nice tumbler! Just wish it had enough grit for a couple of times. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Snowy

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but a total waste of money. It rounded of the rocks but no shine at all. I even ran each step an extra day.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Very Great. Quiet and sturdy. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design. It has multiple days running options. It is quiet running and has shown great results. Thanks. I have been looking forward to this my whole life. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Homescentsations

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly better quality than the ones i had as a kid. Way more quiet and far more durable. Might be worth extending the duration of each cycle a bit, especially final.
customer_reviews.author: Volasar

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a 6 year old. Great tumbler. Simple to operate. Will need patience to see results!
customer_reviews.author: Power User

customer_reviews.title: The rocks rattling around are loud so find a good hiding spot for it
customer_reviews.text: Been running this for over a week straight and it’s functioned perfectly. The rocks rattling around are loud so find a good hiding spot for it. We put ours in our spare room and you don’t hear much through the door. My kids have been extremely excited about checking the rocks. They ask multiple times a day to look at the rocks and see the changes. It’s been worth it just too see their excitement.
customer_reviews.author: bill farnum

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and is making my rocks very ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of loud so I have it on my porch, but it’s what I would expect from a rock tumbler. Super easy to use and is making my rocks very smooth and shiny. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Quieter than expected, we're halfway through our first batch on this sturdily built tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Worked goot for a few months and then you can't even fill it 1/3 full or it stops running
customer_reviews.author: Tim McGuire

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it !!
customer_reviews.text: The tumbler was a Christmas present for our grandson. It did not work. It kept shutting itself off. He was very disappointed. I sent it back and within 4-5 days we had a new one and it hasn’t stopped tumbling for over two weeks now. He is very excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ostheimer

customer_reviews.title: Creates beautiful stones. Requires patience.>
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but this is slow process, so recommend purchase of double drum model.
customer_reviews.author: F Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This little rock tumbler just keeps going. I also bought a big one that I thought would be more durable but not that one broke but this one keeps going. I got it because my grandkids and I like to collect rocks and I thought it would be fun for us. Yep it is!!!!
customer_reviews.author: anita stoddart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tumbler
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our tumbler. Super easy to use and the rocks come out looking great (although I'm still trying to master the polish phase). Each cycle does take time, but worth it. Such a cool thing to have for kids and adults too if you're into rocks.
customer_reviews.author: ohio river

customer_reviews.title: FUN! But
customer_reviews.text: FUN! But...be patient. Turning these rocks into beautiful "gems" takes time. My 5 and 7 year old are learning more about patience. : ) Great toy and project for the rock curious!
customer_reviews.author: TV Boycotter

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - it's been running for a couple of days in my garage. I'm only giving it 4 stars because even with the rubber barrel it is pretty loud, but that is expected for a motorized object tumbling rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for our three children and they loved watching the rocks transform from rough to smooth and shiny. Need to order more rocks and grinding sand a do another set!
customer_reviews.author: staylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler is great for starters. It works well and isn’t super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tumbler and very easy to use. I use tumbler to tumble glass and I get very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Silli me

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is thrilled with the tumbler, I hope the hobby becomes a real hobby. Nice product, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves to pick up little rocks and stones from hikes or at the beach and it has been fun to polish them up in this. The results are quite good. Also, the customer service is outstanding for when we had a wee problem with our first unit, they stood by their guarantee and sent out a new base right away. Also should mention that the customer service reps were very helpful and polite.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: The kids love finding rocks to polish. Fairly noisy so make sure you have some place out of the way to run it.
customer_reviews.author: bagster

customer_reviews.title: not polished
customer_reviews.text: after 30 days and all 4 compounds, the rocks are smooth, but far from shiny, Dr Cool should be shipping free compound to customers
customer_reviews.author: SRT58

customer_reviews.title: Broke before finishing first pack of rocks
customer_reviews.text: Broke on last stage of grit waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our grandkids and they love it! Educational AND fun!
customer_reviews.author: ddup

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with tumbler, it is been running since the day it arrived , great product and great support from seller, I will be ordering another one soon so I can be polishing more rocks and getting faster results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent... i have had it running for almost 8 weeks and its going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a different brand that died after a few days. This one has been running for eight weeks and is still going strong. I do need to get a new belt. This one has stretched out. My one suggestion is that they would have included an extra belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids Not For Adults
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids very small tumbler Beginner level .5-1lb total rock capacity if your going to spend $60 go to harbor freight and grab a 6lb tumbler
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Ulrich Sr

customer_reviews.title: It l polishes rocks of all sorts.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It was a gift and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Jess

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Super fun.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Super fun. Great quality. Recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have used this thing a ton of times already and I love the results!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and kids like it except for the waiting
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit loud. That is the only reason for stars. Easy setup, easy use, and the individual grit makes it easy for the kids. Like it a lot. Hopefully they will get outside just to find some good rocks to tumble and polish.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Taylor

customer_reviews.title: didnt last long at all
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 8 ear old grand daughter who loves rock collecting and she loved how it made the rocks smoothed and shiny. started using it in Jan. and by March it stopped working. we only got to do 3 sets of rocks and gems. very disappointed. I
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Rocking the Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to a friend for Valentines Day. We placed rocks in it immediately and today we took them out after using the #1 grit. They look great. It seems to be easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I Love this tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I Love this tumbler. I use this machine often ro finish off sea glass that i've collected and I havent had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to use. Comes with good instructions. Really nice for the price, no issues so far :)
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: This deice was/is perfect for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: This deice was/is perfect for our daughter! It is a bit noisy so we keep it in our spare bedroom, but it does the job of polishing the rocks, that are provided!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Granddaughter, who loves rocks and crafts. She immediately used the rock tumbler and polished her first batch. She ordered more polishing crystals and has already done two more batches of rocks and is making jewelry with the stones. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: eeveelover

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Rock Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: We are using this with students at our school. It is a great starter tumbler and is much quieter than we expected. Great value and lots of little extras to help get started.
customer_reviews.author: Don P.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best customer service I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Very good value. Ran for many weeks constantly with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. Ran for many weeks constantly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bob USA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old is having fun with this item, which he asked for specifically. Quick delivery! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, durable and easy to use. Have this thing going for hours a day. Comes with a replacement band. Noise is not as loud as other tumblers.

product_meta.title: Discover with Dr. Cool Hobby Rock Tumbler – Easily Transform Rocks into Gemstones
product_meta.description:
Imagine taking dull, ordinary rocks and magically transforming them into sparkling gems…now you can!
With the Hobby Rock Tumbler from Discover with Dr. Cool, making beautiful gemstones is easy! Just add the polishing grit, water, and unpolished stones into the tumbling machine and set the timer. The machine will polish your stones into beautiful, shining gems! There is no better way for boys and girls to learn about geology. This science kit will provide hours of fascinating science fun and comes with everything you need to start exploring the exciting hobby of rock tumbling.

This Science Kit includes:
• High-quality tumbling machine
• Noise-reducing rubber barrel with stainless steel lid
• Half pound of semi-precious stones including amethyst, quartz, tiger’s eye, jasper, agate, and more
• 4 grades of polishing grit
• Jewelry fastenings
• Adventure guide with educational information written by teachers
• Activity booklet with 10 puzzles and games to solve
• Easy-to-follow tumbling instructions
• 2-year manufacturer warranty

With the included jewelry fastenings, kids can even make their very own custom jewelry. Just mount the polished gems into the fastenings and they’re ready to wear!

A Brand You Can Trust
Discover with Dr. Cool is a name parents trust. Founded by a teacher and a life-long rock hound back in 2009, Dr. Cool has won over 100 awards for the play value, educational content, and overall quality of their toys. These awards include:
• 10 Best Toys for Kids - Dr. Toy 
• Kid's Product of the Year - Creative Child Magazine
• Award of Excellence - Parent Tested, Parent Approve
• Best of the Year – Family Review Center
• Brain Toy Award – Academic’s Choice
• Brain Child Toy Award – Tillywig Toy
• Teachers Choice Award - Learning Magazine

All Discover with Dr. Cool products are backed with a 100% satisfaction guarantee, so you know you’re giving a quality gift that any child will love! Join the millions of parents who have chosen Dr. Cool’s science kits for their kids.

Science doesn’t get any cooler than this!
feature_bullets: COMPLETE ROCK TUMBLING KIT – Includes tumbler and barrel, half pound of gemstones (9 different types), polishing grit (4 grades), jewelry fastenings, learning guide, and instructions
DURABLE QUALITY – Backed by our 2-year warranty, this metal base and high-powered motor give you a workhorse machine that will last for years
NOISE-REDUCING BARREL – Features a noise-reducing rubber barrel with stainless steel lid that is both leak-proof and much quieter than plastic barrels
SET IT AND FORGET IT – This easy-to-use tumbler has a programmable timer, giving you bigger results with less energy while never over-tumbling your rocks
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – Includes 2-year warranty. Join the millions of parents who have chosen our award-winning science toys
